title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Team-Based Deliberate Practice Design for Medical Simulation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental principles of medical simulation and foundational mathematical modeling
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Through team-based simulation, a mathematical medical data analysis model can be constructed with 80% accuracy
By following the deliberate practice framework, simulation error patterns can be iteratively improved three or more times to enhance performance by 30%

Learners must collaborate in teams of 3–4 using LMS platforms (Google Classroom, Moodle) and their collaborative tools (Google Docs, Padlet) to produce one AI simulation report, adhering to APA format (5+ references, 10–15 pages) and submitting it two weeks before the course ends (by XX/XX/202X). The report must achieve ≥80/100 points based on the rubric criteria: content accuracy (30%), format compliance (20%), team collaboration (20%), and creativity (30%).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
